description: Defines a Flask Blueprint for a health check route, including a class-based view that returns a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: Class-based view handling the health check endpoint, returning a simple status message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests for the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating the service is healthy.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
